鶭字的基本解释

鶭
fǎng
护田鸟。

鶭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǎng］
［《廣韻》妃兩切，上養，敷。］
水鸟名。又名泽虞，俗称护田鸟。

鶭字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶭； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1496第01
【廣韻】妃兩切【集韻】撫兩切，?音髣。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶭，澤虞。【郭註】今婟澤鳥似水鴞，蒼黑色，常在澤中，見人輒鳴喚不去，有象主守之官，因名云。俗呼爲護田鳥。又【集韻】【類篇】?甫兩切，音昉。義同。【說文】作䲱。

鶭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶭字的起名意思

暂无。

鶭
Basic explanation of words
鶭
fǎng
Hutian bird.
鶭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fǎng］
["Guangyun" concubine cuts in two, raised and applied on top. ]
Waterfowl name. Also known as Zeyu, commonly known as Hutian bird.
鶭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶭; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1496 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Concubine two cuts [Ji Yun] caress two cuts, imitating sound. 【Erya·Shiniao】Yi, Zeyu. [Guo's Note] Today, the henze bird is like a water owl, pale black, and often in the Zezhong. It can't be called when you see people. There are officials like the main guard, because of the name. It is commonly called Hutian bird. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Just two cuts, Yin Fang. The same meaning. 【Said the text】To be a master.
